description: Decimal expansion of sine of 89 degrees.
comments: Also decimal expansion of cosine of 1 degree. - _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Nov 17 2005Equals sin(89*Pi/180). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 01 2014
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
